metadata.description: Roy Hatzfeld has a strange, yet terrible ability: by touching a corpse, he can relive their final moments of life. This allows him to collaborate with police throughout California as a consultant. Roy doesn't like what he does; his existence consists of dying every time he uses his ability. Thanks to him, countless homicides have been solved. Maybe that's the reason Roy keeps working with the police, to give purpose to his curse.But, there's a problem; someone has decided the next corpse the police find will be his.
metadata.name: Serial Victim
